response.original_title: Triple J's One Night Stand Up
response.overview: Triple J's One Night Stand is a concert hosted in a remote town or city in Australia annually. It is promoted and organised by national radio station triple j. In previous years, the host town was selected in the form of a competition where residents of the town must gain approval from local government and a venue. For the 2009 event, triple j itself simply decided to host the event in Sale. The station arranges the artists to perform â€“ usually four high-profile Australian bands of a variety of genres.
response.title: Triple J's One Night Stand Up
